topHeader.announcement: Explore our escape rooms and live an adventure where every detail matters. Find codes, solve riddles, and prove your wit... Ready to escape?

hero.badge: The best escape room experience in Tunja
hero.description: Immerse yourself in a world of puzzles, mysteries and teamwork. Do you have what it takes to escape in 60 minutes?

guidelines.title: Things you must know
guidelines.subtitle: Before entering any of our rooms, it's important to know these basic rules.

rules.title: There is a minimum age per room
lines: Kids 9+ can enter with an adult

rules.title: Don't reveal clues or spoilers
lines: to other groups; let everyone enjoy the mystery

rules.title: Do not distract or ignore
lines: the Game Master; they are there to help you

rules.title: Wear comfortable clothes
lines: and be ready to move and crouch

fact.label: Fun fact:
fact.copy: Average time to find the first clue is 6 to 7 minutes. The first 120 seconds play a key role.

guidelines.cta: Only the brave uncover the mystery

lead.primary: Step into a world where every detail is a clue and every second counts. Discover unique challenges and puzzles that put your mind to the test.
lead.secondary: Gather your crew, spark your curiosity, and let the journey pull you in.

rooms.loadError: We couldn't load the rooms. Showing our favorites.
rooms.comingSoonCopy: A new mission is under construction, ready to test you.

fallback.portal: Jump across worlds, solve puzzles and beat the clock.
fallback.canibal: Stay silent, stay sharp, and escape with your nerves intact.
fallback.manicomio: A psychological escape where every detail matters.

opinions.title: What our players say
opinions.lead: Real stories from teams who already lived the Logic experience.

lead: The larger the group, the lower the cost per person.
Prices vary depending on whether you come on weekdays or weekends.

highlight.subtitle: Rates designed for every team size.

booking.chooseRoomDesc: Select the room you'd like to book and follow the steps.
booking.sendReceipt: Send payment receipt to corporate number

sections.title: WHO WE ARE
sections.body: At Logic Escape Room we are creators of hidden worlds, stories you live up close, and challenges that awaken your wit. We were born to turn a simple game into a memorable experience: detailed environments, clever puzzles, and an atmosphere where nothing is what it seems.

sections.title: WHAT WE DO
sections.body: At Logic we design and operate immersive escape experiences where groups of friends, families, couples, or teams must solve riddles, find clues, and complete missions before time runs out. We build original themed rooms, craft unique puzzles, and create environments that blend technology, narrative, and gameplay. Our goal is to give you an intense, exciting, and different adventure.

footer.note: Write to us and book your adventure

cafeteria.title: Cafeteria Menu
cafeteria.subtitle: Recharge before or after your mission. Freshly made options for your team.

banner.title: Want to play while you wait?
banner.copy: We have board games for the cafeteria. Learn how to play in 30 seconds.
